attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give British workers priority when new jobs are available. Especially in these times make sure companies offer the jobs to British workers above all else. 

Also evaluate foreign workers from EU and the world every six months to determine if their skills are still required here and whether or not there is a need for them to be in that job, especially since we have such high unemployment now too and we have so many in low skilled jobs.

What is happening at Lindsey Oil Refinery at North Killingholme, North Lincolnshire is a prime example and is a disgrace, the government needs to act! Protect all our jobs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
